content: the socks are designed for the 2025 scarefest kal the sock are plain stocking stitch with a few intarsia colour knit symbols the socks are knit toe up with a flap and gusset heel knit using a 2 25mm needle and 4ply yarn sizing is for a small to medium foot shoe size 6 but can be adjusted by casting on extra sts at the beginning will need around 100g of mc 10g of 3 contrasting colours
